caption: A figure with a distinctive blue and white headscarf, wearing a yellow and white garment, set against a dark background.

A young woman standing among flowers. She is wearing a white T-shirt and has long brown hair. Her eyes are blue, with light makeup on her face. She looks calm and natural. The background features green plants and white flowers.
Aerial view of a serene beach with white sand, blue sea, and green-topped rocks. Waves splash against the shore.
This is a white marble bust of a young man with curly hair, wearing a toga and draped over his shoulder. He has a calm expression and looks straight ahead. The background is white.

This is a photo of a pile of variously colored rocks. The colors include gray, white, black, brown and other mixed colors. These stones are of different shapes and sizes, some are round, while others have sharp edges. They are closely packed together, creating a rich texture and visual appeal.

a figure with a distinctive blue and white headscarf, wearing a yellow and white garment, set against a dark background.A red-haired woman in armor, with green eyes and freckles on her face. She is wearing silver armor with gold decorations and purple clothing underneath. Her hair is flowing in the wind, and she holds a sword in her hand. The background is dark green.
